title: Reddit
cleaned_text: [r/bleach](/r/bleach/) A community for the manga/anime series Bleach and it's spinoff series Burn the Witch It's something I've seen in fanfictions and does anyone know where it comes from. Because in the manga he's is showing to quite talented in sensing spiritual energy. Hell rukia literally says only a seasoned soul reaper can see spirit ribbons In chapter 8 of the manga He is also shown repeatedly to be quite capable of sensing others in the manga and anime PS Sorry if this is a bit ranty. It's just something that I find Annoying whenever read about it so does anyone know where belief that Ichigo can't sense Comes from
